attributes.action: TO ASK THE QUEEN TO DISSOLVE PARLIAMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to ask the prime minister to ask our Queen to dissolve parliament on behalf of her subjects as we no longer have any confidence in our elected MPS due to the expenses revelations

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
